actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to provide 100 per centum Federal funding of financial audits of facilities participating in medicare and medicaid conducted by State personnel.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide Federal payment of the entire cost of financial audits of skilled nursing and intermediate care facilities participating in Federal programs.

titles.title: A bill to provide 100 per centum Federal funding of financial audits of facilities participating in medicare and medicaid conducted by State personnel.
